name: Lock Parsing 2
description:
Lock Parsing 2 - simulator of opening the lock, where you are tasked to find the right combination that will help to open the lock as quickly as possible.
Locks vary in complexity. Some locks you can open in 10 seconds, but with others you spend a few minutes. Tease your brain and move picklock into the correct position to open the lock!

Use [AD] to move, good luck!
